### completeRegionsUntil() {#a5c8433456c6ef84e4cc037f6f108d276}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CoverageMapping.cpp&#125;::SegmentBuilder::completeRegionsUntil (std::optional&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coverage/#a851320504101eab08260161f30355996">LineColPair</a> &gt; Loc, unsigned FirstCompletedRegion)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Emit segments for active regions which end before <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a></code>.

<code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>:</code> The start location of the next region. If std::nullopt, all active regions are completed. <code>FirstCompletedRegion:</code> Index of the first completed region.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp/#l01175">1175</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp">CoverageMapping.cpp</a>.

### startSegment() {#afa2091cacde43c2884f003c63f0741a6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CoverageMapping.cpp&#125;::SegmentBuilder::startSegment (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &amp; Region, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coverage/#a851320504101eab08260161f30355996">LineColPair</a> StartLoc, bool IsRegionEntry, bool EmitSkippedRegion=false)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Emit a segment with the count from <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a></code> starting at <code>StartLoc</code>.

<code>IsRegionEntry:</code> The segment is at the start of a new non-gap region. <code>EmitSkippedRegion:</code> The segment must be emitted as a skipped region.
